description: Rental of Electric Golf Carts- Fundy National Park
duration_in_months: This tender (bidding process) must be submitted within 30 days after publication. Please see the tender for exact end dates.
full_summary:
### Rental of Electric Golf Carts - Fundy National Park
#### Description and Requirements
Parks Canada invites bid submissions for the rental of 22 electric golf carts for the 2023 season at the Fundy National Park Golf Course, with two option years: 2024 and 2025. The rental period will be from May 18, 2023, to October 17, 2023.

#### Bid Submission Guidelines
*   Bids will be accepted electronically in compliance with the following guidelines:
    *   Send to: [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca)
    *   Maximum email file size: 15 MB
    *   No email links; attach bid documents only
    *   Label multiple email submissions correctly, including the solicitation number, project name, and number of email submissions (Example: "1 of 2")
*   Fax submissions will be accepted, but bid documents must be scanned and attached.
*   In-person and courier submissions are not accepted.

#### Technical and Legal Requirements
*   Bidders must be aware of and comply with all national park regulations, including ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations as outlined in the National Park Act.
*   Considerations for Canadian businesses, including Free Trade Agreements with Canada and provisional language rights, are noted under Trade Agreements below.

#### Trade Agreements and Provisional Language Rights
This bid invites contractors that are eligible under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

Parks Canada also affirms its commitment to providing documents in both official languages. However, in the event of discrepancies between the English and French documents, please notify the contract officer as soon as possible for suitable adjustments.

#### Inquiry Procedure
Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and be received no later than 5 business days before the closing date. Late submissions may not receive a response. Contact information can be found below.

#### Contactor Information

Contact Name: Bonnie Knott  
Contact Title:  
Contact Email: [bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca](mailto:bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca)  
Contact Phone: 709-636-4953
